# init(from:)

**Initializer**

Creates captured room data by deserializing the decoder of a prior scan.

## Declaration

```swift
init(from decoder: any Decoder) throws
```

## Parameters

- **decoder**: An encoded captured room data object.

## Discussion

To serialize a scan, call [doc://com.apple.RoomPlan/documentation/RoomPlan/CapturedRoomData/encode(to:)].
title: init(from:)
